snippet: The chief of TripAdvisor said the Web site now preferred to accentuate the positive about hotels and destinations.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column notes TripAdvisor has abandoned its widely cited lists of the dirtiest and grungiest hotels in various regions of the world, including the United States; notes the Web site now prefers to accentuate the positive about hotels and destinations.
lead_paragraph: The chief of TripAdvisor said the Web site now preferred to accentuate the positive about hotels and destinations.

headline.print_headline: TripAdvisor Abandons List of Dirtiest Hotels
headline.seo: TripAdvisor Abandons List of Dirtiest Hotels
headline.main: TripAdvisor Abandons List of Dirtiest Hotels
